name: Having a Home
description:
Having a Home is a 2D endless runner that encourages animal adoption, where players will be playing as a human who will be potentially adopted by animals depending on the players’ decisions.

“You won’t change the world by saving an animal,” said ForDogTrainers, “but you will change that animal’s world.”

“Until one has loved an animal, a part of one’s soul remains unawakened”, said Anatole France.

Adopt! Don’t Shop!
